scripts.instrument: yarn copy-packages && yarn instrument-single-focus-trap && yarn instrument-use-simple-focus-trap
scripts.report-single-focus-trap: node ./scripts/log-package-name-for-coverage.js single-focus-trap && nyc report -r text -r lcov -t ./coverage/single-focus-trap --report-dir ./coverage/single-focus-trap
scripts.report-use-simple-focus-trap: node ./scripts/log-package-name-for-coverage.js use-simple-focus-trap && nyc report -r text -r lcov -t ./coverage/use-simple-focus-trap --report-dir ./coverage/use-simple-focus-trap
scripts.e2e-open: yarn instrument && yarn src-to-instrumented && concurrently -k "yarn workspace demo dev-pick-up-new-test-instrumentation" "yarn cy-open"; yarn instrumented-to-src && yarn report-coverage
scripts.e2e-run: yarn instrument && yarn src-to-instrumented && concurrently -k "yarn workspace demo dev-pick-up-new-test-instrumentation" "yarn cy-run"; yarn instrumented-to-src && yarn report-coverage
scripts.e2e-run-h: yarn instrument && yarn src-to-instrumented && concurrently -k "yarn workspace demo dev-pick-up-new-test-instrumentation" "yarn cy-run-headed"; yarn instrumented-to-src && yarn report-coverage
